translations: 蹬车（pedal 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: I saw her pedalling along the towpath.
sentences.translation: 我看见她在纤道上骑自行车。

sentences.sentence: She had been pedalling her exercise bike all morning.
sentences.translation: 她整个上午都在蹬健身车。

sentences.sentence: Television has been accused of soft-pedalling bad news.
sentences.translation: 有人指责电视对坏消息轻描淡写。
